text: 9.22 Lom 11.14, 15.1, 1 Ko 10.33, 2 Ko 11.29 Binɨb Klays nop gos kɨles ma nepal okok nab ak mɨdɨl, God yɨl yelaŋ agɨl, yad ayɨp wɨlɨkɨl mɨdon yɨp nɨgel, bɨ kɨli olap tek lup. Yad binɨb okok kul gɨnɨgel tek lek nɨŋɨd, ogɨnap Klays nop del kɨlop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, kanɨb okok mɨdupsek pɨyow nɨŋɨd, kɨli mɨdupsek ayɨp wɨlɨkɨl mɨdɨlɨg agñɨtep gɨpin.
